sourcesContent:
import React, {useEffect, useState, useRef, useMemo, Ref} from 'react'; import axios from "axios"; import {Table, Container, Modal, Button, Form, FormGroup} from 'react-bootstrap'; import { MovieDetailsDto, MovieDto } from '../model'; import { AiFillEye, AiFillEdit, AiFillDelete } from 'react-icons/ai'; import { BASE_API } from '../constants'; const TopMovieComponent = ( {year}: number |null) => { const [movies, setMovies] = useState([]) const [showDetails, setShowDetails] = useState(false); const [movie, setMovie] = useState(null) useEffect(() => { axios.get(BASE_API + "/top-movies", {params: {"pageSize" : 10, "pageNumber": 0}}).then(res =>{ setMovies([...movies, ...res.data.content]); }) }, []) const handleCloseDetails = () => setShowDetails(false); const handleShowDetails = () => setShowDetails(true); const getMovieDetails = (id:string) =>{ axios.get(BASE_API+"/"+id).then(res => { setMovie(res.data); }) } return ( <> {movies.map((movie, index) =>( ) )}
RANK TITLE YEAR RATING REVENUE
{index+1} {movie.title} {new Date(movie.date).getFullYear()} {movie.rating} ${movie.revenue.toLocaleString('en-US', {maximumFractionDigits:2})} {handleShowDetails(); getMovieDetails(movie.id)}}/>
{movie?.title}
Release date
{movie?.date}
Genre
{movie?.genres.map(({ name }) => name).join(', ')}
Description
{movie?.description}
Director
{movie?.director.fullName}
Actors
{movie?.actors.map(({ fullName }) => fullName).join(', ')}
Runtime
{movie?.runtime + " mins"}
Rating
{movie?.rating}
Votes
{movie?.votes}
Revenue
${movie?.revenue.toLocaleString('en-US', {maximumFractionDigits:2})}
 ) } export default TopMovieComponent
